name: Genre Manager
overview: Display movie genres on the home page as Netflix-style sections via Home Screen Sections plugin
description: A Jellyfin plugin that integrates with Home Screen Sections to display genre-based sections on the home page. Features configurable genre selection, customizable items per section, movies and/or TV series support. Requires Home Screen Sections plugin to be installed.

versions.changelog: Fix: Added extensive logging to debug section display issues. Improved payload handling from HomeScreen plugin.

Complete rewrite - Integrates natively with Home Screen Sections plugin for standard Netflix-style genre sections on home page. Configurable genre selection, customizable items per section, support for movies and TV series. Requires Home Screen Sections plugin.
